content: happy sunday pals not only is it sunday but it s also my birthday weekend i wanted to give you a present instead so here is the free crochet kindle pouch this pouch is super simple looks great with any yarn and it works up super quickly even though you re using fingering weight yarn i love how this yarn specifically looks you can find more about it by clicking on the link under project supplies if you want this specific colorway or really any fingering weight will work anyway i hope you like it and i can t wait to see the ones you create
